What do mean "Doesn't work". Have been seeding this for months now, nobody has complained yet. What player do you use? This is MKV-format, can't play that in Windows Mediaplayer...
Endgame is the fourth movie, so this torrent includes 1, 2 and 4, the description is the third movie, but the file is definitely Endgame

Great torrent - Thank You!

Can you please tell me if there is a way to turn off the subtitles?

Thank you again!

It all depends on what kind of player you use to turn off subtitles.

VLC Player - Right click during playing the movie, Video - Subtitles Track - Disable.

If you use a media box, well, read the manual.

These are excellent copies at very high compression rates.  Fucking Excellent.  I own this DVD and it was scratched so I downloaded it.  This copy is better than my original store bought.  Thank you.
I'm pleased to hear that! I DO my effort to keep the quality high.
Not to nitpick but Endgame is the FOURTH movie.
i seem to have some difficulty with playing these mkv files, VLC says it is each move is a file of 1,3Gb but also says it contains 0 sec of movie, any thoughts on how to fix this pls.

Or try mkvtoolnix to analyze or rebuild them.
